hero.title: Our Products
hero.description: Explore conscious collections for children and pets—designed in India, crafted with renewable materials, and tested to the highest international safety standards.

categories.title: Kids Wear
categories.description: Soft, breathable garments made from certified organic and natural fibres, engineered to keep little adventurers comfortable and safe.

products.title: Organic Cotton T-Shirts
products.description: Ultra-soft tees in playful prints, dyed with Azo-free pigments and built to withstand countless washes and playground tumbles.

products.title: Eco-Stretch Pants
products.description: Room-to-grow bottoms that blend organic cotton with a touch of natural-rubber elastic for flexible, long-lasting wear.

products.title: Linen-Blend Dresses
products.description: Lightweight, twirl-friendly silhouettes featuring coconut-shell buttons and airy linen-cotton weaves for hot summer days.

categories.title: Kids Toys
categories.description: Learning-driven playthings crafted from renewable resources and finished with food-grade coatings for worry-free fun.

products.title: Educational Building Blocks
products.description: Colour-coded wooden blocks that teach shapes, numbers, and stacking physics while sparking imagination.

products.title: Recycled Cardboard Puzzles
products.description: Beautifully illustrated jigsaws printed on 100% post-consumer board to develop fine motor skills and patience.

products.title: Natural Wooden Pull Toys
products.description: Classic pull-along animals with smooth rolling wheels, encouraging toddlers to walk and explore.

categories.title: Pet Wear
categories.description: Functional, comfortable apparel engineered for wagging tails and endless adventures—without compromising on style.

products.title: Weather-Resistant Coats
products.description: Lightweight shell jackets that shield pups from rain and wind while keeping them visible on evening walks.

products.title: Comfort Harnesses
products.description: Ergonomic Y-frame harnesses that distribute pressure evenly and prevent chafing on sensitive fur.

products.title: Bandanas & Bows
products.description: Reversible accessories cut from production off-cuts—turning surplus fabric into tail-wagging fashion.

categories.title: Pet Toys
categories.description: Durable, enriching toys that keep pets engaged while prioritising safety and eco-responsibility.

products.title: Interactive Puzzle Toys
products.description: Treat-dispensing puzzles that challenge canine problem-solving skills and reduce boredom.

products.title: Chew-Resistant Toys
products.description: Tough yet gentle chew bones engineered for aggressive gnawers, tested to outlast conventional rubber toys.

products.title: Eco-Friendly Rope Toys
products.description: Hand-braided tug ropes that double as dental floss, spun from natural jute and cotton fibres.
